TopicTitle: Station-in-a-box! Easy to build high capacity science station!

Articles.Content:
I made this craft for a request in my company(link in sig):

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions:

Here's the launcher subassembly:

http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-launcher

And the core(Place a cupola in the VAB and attach this below that):

http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-core

Dock 3 of these to the core(Place a probe in the VAB, add this subassembly then reroot to the top docking port):

http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Crew-modules

Then dock three of these on(Same instructions for setting it up in the VAB as the Crew modules):

http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-supply-module

Individually launch each of the modules and dock them.

Enjoy!

Edited June 27, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist

Very cool!

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/Station%201.png

Thanks, I'm glad it was easy to assemble!

Pro tip: you can edit a thread's title by going into "advanced" editing. Button below what you are writing when you edit. Ahem capicity Ahem. Quite a breeze here, right?

Rune. Nice station BTW.

Thanks for catching that!

(I hope my station name isn't too much like your amazing base-in-a-box).
I'm in the process of putting together another station, this time with the bottom cupola. Can't believe I overlooked that on the first one! Will post a picture when complete.

Nice!

I'm glad it worked for you!

I'm building my station currently. I really like this one, but I'm not a big fan of using other people's crafts, so I'm just copying yours by building it myself. Thanks for the inspiration, though. The station shaping up well, all because of you. Without this inspiration, I would have just built another mass of trusses and useless solar panels.

Very nice build! I sense one problem, though- no boxes. How will you fix?

I suggest more cowbell/boxes.

I'm building my station currently. I really like this one, but I'm not a big fan of using other people's crafts, so I'm just copying yours by building it myself. Thanks for the inspiration, though. The station shaping up well, all because of you. Without this inspiration, I would have just built another mass of trusses and useless solar panels.

Thank you!

Very nice build! I sense one problem, though- no boxes. How will you fix?

I suggest more cowbell/boxes.

Thanks, I don't know how I'll fix. Maybe if it came in a box, and launched on a heavier rocket? Will test.
You could completely ignore aerodynamics and put it in a .90-style fairing! With wings and things! No tubes for you!
